data.text: @Samanyainsaan Putin- A fucking war criminal. Hope see him tried in The Hague soon and then meet his fate.
@kiritkoladiya @AnnuApriya @Samanyainsaan I understand what you are saying sir...you don't have to repeat it again and again ✌🏻

@drdrake7755 @AnnuApriya @Samanyainsaan Someone enter in your home with gun and tell you to leave your home and surrender your property , wife ,sisters and family to him.
Would you allow it ? Will you fight for it or fly?
Right now evil #putin is doing same in #Ukraine️.
#UkraineRussianWar
#Indianswithukraine

@AnnuApriya @Samanyainsaan Come one,.
You can't see what's happening right now ???
Who invaded whom?

 NATO is just one excuse to justify invasion ,otherwise NATO was going to close soon.

You are affected by Russian propaganda.
Hope you recover soon.

@kiritkoladiya @Samanyainsaan It's not a matter of taking sides Sir! They both r murderers.Zelensky z in fool's paradise n d world is clapping.Any peace loving person vl want him to understand Ukraine is imp than its association wid NATO.West z adding fuel 2 d fire.Ukrainians r heroes not Zelensky.

@kiritkoladiya @Samanyainsaan Any sane person vl think of protecting family,not d house.Bhagat Singh etc fought against invaders who came 2 exploit.Russia simply don't want ukraine 2 bring US at its door! Ppl r dying in Ukraine! N Zelensky z determined to join NATO at cost of lives.
